stickies! #0

tap or type to start!

0.00s 0 errors

instructions

when the game starts, you will see a grid of symbols. you need to type all of the symbols in the grid to complete the game.

the catch is that the symbols are out of order. to know what to type next, follow the cursor, or use your intuition.

you will be timed, and mistakes will be counted. good luck!
